languages.text: {n}Висирь кротко кивает.{/n} "Кровь моя пропитана снадобьем, что принимают идущие нитью Паутины. Для служителей культа сакрально оно и безвредно, но для тебя — что дурман. И все же ты понял{mf||а}, Домин'{name}, что разум подводит тело и чувства. То было испытание проницательности духа. Прош{mf|ел|ла} ты его".

{n}The Vizsier nods meekly.{/n} "My blood is infused with a concoction taken by those who follow the thread. It is sacred and harmless to us, but you it befogs and afflicts. And yet, Domin'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."
languages.original_text: {n}Висирь кротко кивает.{/n} "Кровь моя пропитана снадобьем, что принимают идущие нитью Паутины. Для служителей культа сакрально оно и безвредно, но для тебя — что дурман. И все же ты понял{mf||а}, Домин'{name}, что разум подводит тело и чувства. То было испытание проницательности духа. Прош{mf|ел|ла} ты его".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Vizsier nods briefly.{/n} "A potion taken by Ahn'shini followers permeates my blood. It is sacred and harmless to a cultist, but for you, it has an intoxicating quality. And yet, Enim'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."

And yet, Enim'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."

And yet, Domin'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir nickt sanftmütig.{/n} "Mein Blut ist gestärkt durch einen Trank, den jene trinken, die dem Faden folgen. Für uns ist er heilig und harmlos, doch Euch benebelt er und macht Euch krank. Und doch, Domin'{name}, habt Ihr erkannt, dass der Verstand den Körper und die Sinne im Stich lassen kann. Dies war die Prüfung des spirituellen Scharfsinns. Ihr habt sie bestanden."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods meekly.{/n} "My blood is infused with a concoction taken by those who follow the thread. It is sacred and harmless to us, but you it befogs and afflicts. And yet, Domin'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wesir nickt sanftmütig.{/n} "Mein Blut ist gestärkt durch einen Trank, den jene trinken, die dem Faden folgen. Für uns ist er heilig und harmlos, doch Euch benebelt er und macht Euch krank. Und doch, Domin'{name}, habt Ihr erkannt, dass der Verstand den Körper und die Sinne im Stich lassen kann. Dies war die Prüfung des spirituellen Scharfsinns. Ihr habt sie bestanden."

languages.text: {n}El Visir asiente con docilidad.{/n} «Mi sangre está impregnada de una pócima que tomamos los seguidores del hilo. Es sagrada e inofensiva para nosotros, pero a los demás los ofusca y aflige. Y aun así, Domin'{name}, ha comprendido que la mente puede fallar al cuerpo y a los sentidos. Esta era la prueba de la perspicacia espiritual. La ha superado».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods meekly.{/n} "My blood is infused with a concoction taken by those who follow the thread. It is sacred and harmless to us, but you it befogs and afflicts. And yet, Domin'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Visir asiente con docilidad.{/n} «Mi sangre está impregnada de una pócima que tomamos los seguidores del hilo. Es sagrada e inofensiva para nosotros, pero a los demás los ofusca y aflige. Y aun así, Domin'{name}, ha comprendido que la mente puede fallar al cuerpo y a los sentidos. Esta era la prueba de la perspicacia espiritual. La ha superado».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールが素直にうなずく。{/n}「私の血には、ウェブの糸をたどる物の信者が飲む薬が混じっている。我々には神聖かつ無害なものだが、あなたには幻惑と苦痛を与える。それでもドミン・{name}、あなたは精神が肉体や感覚を損なう可能性があることを理解された。これは霊的な洞察の試練だ。あなたはそれを乗り越えた」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods meekly.{/n} "My blood is infused with a concoction taken by those who follow the thread. It is sacred and harmless to us, but you it befogs and afflicts. And yet, Domin'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールが素直にうなずく。{/n}「私の血には、ウェブの糸をたどる物の信者が飲む薬が混じっている。我々には神聖かつ無害なものだが、あなたには幻惑と苦痛を与える。それでもドミン・{name}、あなたは精神が肉体や感覚を損なう可能性があることを理解された。これは霊的な洞察の試練だ。あなたはそれを乗り越えた」

languages.text: {n}宿老温顺地点了点头。{/n}“我的血液中浸透了教派的药剂。对追随织血罗网丝线的信徒而言，这样的药剂是神圣无害的，但可能会给您带来困扰，让您感到痛苦。不过，秘者{name}，您已经意识到精神可能会为身体与感官带来负担。这是针对精神敏感的试炼，而您已经通过了试炼。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods meekly.{/n} "My blood is infused with a concoction taken by those who follow the thread. It is sacred and harmless to us, but you it befogs and afflicts. And yet, Domin'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老温顺地点了点头。{/n}“我的血液中浸透了教派的药剂。对追随织血罗网丝线的信徒而言，这样的药剂是神圣无害的，但可能会给您带来困扰，让您感到痛苦。不过，秘者{name}，您已经意识到精神可能会为身体与感官带来负担。这是针对精神敏感的试炼，而您已经通过了试炼。”

languages.text: {n}Le vizir acquiesce d'un air docile.{/n} « Dans mes veines coule une potion réservée à celles et ceux qui suivent le fil. Un breuvage sacré et inoffensif pour nous, mais qui induit chez vous confusion et affliction. Malgré tout, Domin'{name}, vous avez compris que l'esprit peut tromper le corps et les sens. Ce faisant, vous venez de réussir l'épreuve de l'acuité spirituelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods meekly.{/n} "My blood is infused with a concoction taken by those who follow the thread. It is sacred and harmless to us, but you it befogs and afflicts. And yet, Domin'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vizir acquiesce d'un air docile.{/n} « Dans mes veines coule une potion réservée à celles et ceux qui suivent le fil. Un breuvage sacré et inoffensif pour nous, mais qui induit chez vous confusion et affliction. Malgré tout, Domin'{name}, vous avez compris que l'esprit peut tromper le corps et les sens. Ce faisant, vous venez de réussir l'épreuve de l'acuité spirituelle. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir, uysal bir şekilde başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Kanım, ipliğin peşinden gidenlerce alınan bir karışımla birlikte akıyor. Bizler için kutsal ve zararsızdır ancak sizleri etkileyerek şaşkına çevirir. Domin'{name}, yine de zihnin bedeni ve hisleri yanıltabildiğini kavradınız. Bu, ruhani dirayet imtihanıydı ve bu imtihanı başarıyla geçtiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods meekly.{/n} "My blood is infused with a concoction taken by those who follow the thread. It is sacred and harmless to us, but you it befogs and afflicts. And yet, Domin'{name}, you have grasped that the mind may fail the body and the senses. This was the trial of spiritual acumen. You have passed it."
